Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock scored a century
Australia lost their first two World Cup matches
Shamsi has his first World Cup wicket
Post-Match Reflections: Bavuma: 'I do think 310 was over par.'
de Kock: 'It was a great win for the boys.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was the focus at the toss and Australia decided their bowlers would test it first.
The fielding – and in particular, the catching – was extremely poor and that has to be the first place the Aussies look.
For South Africa, well, what a start. They’ve trounced Sri Lanka and now Australia – the team some thought would be India’s biggest challengers.
